abstract: Daniel B Burke, former chief executive who helped engineer the acquisition of the American Broadcasting Company by Capital Cities, one of the boldest corporate takeovers of the 1980s, dies at age 82.
snippet: Mr. Burke helped engineer the acquisition of the American Broadcasting Company by Capital Cities, one of the boldest corporate takeovers of the 1980s.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Burke helped engineer the acquisition of the American Broadcasting Company by Capital Cities, one of the boldest corporate takeovers of the 1980s.

headline.main: Daniel B. Burke, Leading Media Executive, Dies at 82
headline.print_headline: Daniel B. Burke, Leading Media Executive, Dies at 82
headline.seo: Daniel Burke, Executive Who Helped Fashion Capital Cities-ABC Deal, Dies at 82
